hadiths.text: Abdullah b. 'Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) spent the night at Dhu'l-Hulaifa while commencing (the rites of) Pilgrimage and he observed prayer in the mosque

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَسْجِدِ ذِي الْحُلَيْفَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Praying at the Masjid of Dhul-Hulaifah
